entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 4 April 2023
